div.p: This PTO sponsored contest is designed to spark student interest in geography and increase awareness about resources available through the N...
Food Donations were delivered in March

span.p: Schools will be closed for the duration of the public health emergency, or until a subsequent order lifts this specific restriction.
The 2020-2021 regular open enrollment application period is February 3, 2020 - April 30, 2020 at 4:00p.m.
Board of Education regular monthly meetings are normally held on the 3rd Monday of each month. Additional Board meetings may be scheduled as needed.
